title: STAT+: Trump administration is urged to use a federal law to authorize generic versions of GLP-1 drugs
description: Public Citizen contends that Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly's obesity drugs are straining budgets so much that generics should be authorized.
content: Public Citizen contends that Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly's obesity drugs are straining budgets so much that generics should be authorized.
